SVGTransformAngle.summary: The angle read-only property of the interface represents the angle of the transformation in degrees.

remarks.para: For SVG_TRANSFORM_ROTATE, SVG_TRANSFORM_SKEWX, and SVG_TRANSFORM_SKEWY, angle reflects the transformation's rotation or skewing angle.
For SVG_TRANSFORM_MATRIX, SVG_TRANSFORM_TRANSLATE and SVG_TRANSFORM_SCALE, angle will be zero.

SVGTransformAngle.value: An integer; the angle value in degrees as a float.
